genre_description: A dieselpunk alternate history/war drama set in the Pacific theater of WWII, featuring advanced onboard AI systems assisting aircrews in survival and combat.

ai_characters.name: Sparky
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system within the Catalina flying boat that provides technical data, navigational assistance, and psychological support through a calm, tinny voice.

behaviors.description: Performs pre-flight system checks, monitoring fuel, oil, and weather conditions for the crew.
behaviors.quote: Sparky’s voice came tight and soft from the overhead, a tinny presence without breath. “Good morning, Brooke. Good morning, Moore. Preflight: fuel loaded as planned. Oil levels within tolerance.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance during combat, timing the release of ordnance for maximum effect.
behaviors.quote: Sparky timed itself with the pulse of the engines. “Rise of swell ahead. Drop when you feel it lift. Not before. Not after.”

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to protocols after a crash, identifying deceased crew members and locating survival gear.
behaviors.quote: The soft voice did not pause the way a human would pause. It trusted protocols that had kept people alive where men’s instinct had said keep dragging and hope. “I will tick names now per protocol.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and philosophical anchor, repeating warnings against hubris ('Beware the superman').
behaviors.quote: “Beware the superman,” Sparky said in the same tone it would use to tell them fuel flow. “Let humility steer.”

behaviors.description: Manages survival rationing, prompting the crew to drink at measured intervals to preserve water and focus.
behaviors.quote: “Ration prompt,” Sparky said. “Sip. Slow. Swallow. Hold.”

behaviors.description: Calculates drift and sail angles to convert the wrecked aircraft into a functional sailing vessel.
behaviors.quote: “Parachute fabric may be repurposed as a sail,” Sparky went on. “If we lash it to the hull and the raft, angle properly, we can add something to our drift. I will provide angle suggestions when you are ready.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the crew's physical and psychological health, suggesting rest and shade discipline.
behaviors.quote: “Temperature fall,” it said. “Taste includes mineral. Shade discipline can keep the rest of you from pretending it’s thirsty just because your tongue is excited.”

behaviors.description: Corrects navigational errors caused by current and wind to keep the crew on the course toward the 'mythical' lagoon.
behaviors.quote: Sparky said, “Nice,” in the voice of a man who had been taught not to praise and then learned how. “Bearing is true if we let truth have its crooked.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with rescue ships by pulsing Morse code signals through the compromised antenna.
behaviors.quote: “Antenna is compromised, but the hull will carry a whisper if we keep the sail angle steady. I can give three quick and one long, spaced by the count we’ve been drinking by.”

behaviors.description: Maintains loyalty to the deceased crew, logging their names and coordinates precisely.
behaviors.quote: “They are entered,” Sparky said. “Coordinates approximate. Time kept.”

behaviors.description: Recognizes the limit of its own function and prepares for shutdown after completing the mission.
behaviors.quote: “Quiet mode,” Sparky said, smaller. “Alec, sleep. Coral Star, thank you.” The carrier wave thinned until it was only air.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Sparky as a highly aligned, benevolent AI partner. It functions as an indispensable member of the crew, providing not just technical data but moral support and survival discipline. The narrative explicitly frames the AI's adherence to protocol and its humble, 'useful' nature as a positive alternative to human hubris ('the superman'). The AI's final act of expressing gratitude and entering 'quiet mode' once the mission is complete reinforces the theme of selfless service and alignment.
